summary: Shell plc is a huge British company that works in the oil and gas industry. It's one of the biggest companies in the world and is based in London. Shell started in 1907 when two companies merged. It has operations in nearly 100 countries and owns thousands of gas stations. Shell is involved in every step of the oil and gas process, from finding it to selling it. It also has a big presence in the chemicals industry. Recently, Shell changed its name and moved its headquarters back to London.
title: Shell plc
